column3: “I got this Trainwreck (was told it's Arcana Trainwreck". It looked and smelled like Trainwreck on steroids. The smell was phenomenal
column5: tasted very earthy with that chemmy or diesel after-notes. The crystal trichromes were milky to gold colored

column1: The effects are what sold me though
column2: granted I don't get too high

column3: “Spicy in every way! Not for novices, but pros should DEF have this medication as a staple..”
“amazing high/relief. however, girlfriend woke up with a migraine level headache and has been crying in pain, so fair warning, it quite possibly could give you a horrid headache”

“I think the strain is overall pretty satisfying, especially of the sativa type high.
It burns like kitchen spice on the drag, but a reedeming payoff of this would be the scents of sour tasting sage like hits.
Definitely heady, just some pretty dope dope.”
“Pure fire! Really need to try its on my top 5”
“Killer sativa. Makes every day an adventure. Warning, possible paranoia may occur.”
